name: AmanziTel
overview: AmanziTel is revolutionizing wireless network optimization by providing an open source platform to visualize, analyze, manipulate, and report network information. Through customization services, scripting interfaces and open source code, the user is empowered to adapt the platform to exactly their own requirements and way of working. This allows users to maximise their effect in optimizing the network while dramatically reducing the costs usually accompanying the purchase of powerful and effective optimisation tools. AmanziTelâ€™s platforms act like a glue that binds the capabilities of existing tools while providing pre-defined analysis and allowing users to create their own applications.
